name: Idle Restaurant.
description:
Build your restaurant empire now by managing restaurants and idle profit!
Expand your empire & give it a boost with managers that will automate the workflow of your restaurants! Take on the challenge and discover the best restaurant management strategy and earn as much cash as possible!

FEATURES:
• Automate your workflow to increase your idle income
• Get idle cash, even when you are offline
• Profit from a smart investment or two to boost your economy
• Hire managers to increase your workers’ motivation
• Every manager has a special tycoon effect
• No internet connection needed

◆◆◆ Will YOU be the greatest restaurant tycoon ever? ◆◆◆


Please leave a comment at App Store if you have any question.
